vote.title: Authorize a five-year cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase of hardware, software, and managed services to upgrade the City’s 9-1-1 system for the Department of Information and Technology Services with AT&T Corporation through the Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $9,960,327.12 - Financing:  Federal 9-1-1 Grant Program 19-22 Fund ($700,570.74) and 9-1-1 System Operations Fund ($9,259,756.38) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a five-year cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase of hardware, software, and managed services to upgrade the City’s 9-1-1 system for the Department of Information and Technology Services with AT&T Corporation through the Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $9,960,327.12 - Financing:  Federal 9-1-1 Grant Program 19-22 Fund ($700,570.74) and 9-1-1 System Operations Fund ($9,259,756.38) (subject to annual appropriations)
